example.eg: Now Trevor has lost his job, he needs to reduce his monthly outgoings.
example.egtrans: 现在特莱福失去了自己的工作，需要减少每月的开销。

example.eg: By extending the term of her mortgage, Jane reduced her monthly payments to £400.
example.egtrans: 简延长了自己的贷款还款期限，将每月分期付款减少到400英镑。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 将…减少到, 使…变少到

dsense.name: reduce [sth]
dsense.guideword: (rate, etc.: lower) (利率、税率、通货膨胀率等)

example.eg: The bank has lowered the interest rate on our mortgage.
The Bank of England has reduced interest rates to 0.5%.
example.egtrans: 英格兰银行已经将利率降到0.5％。

example.eg: The factory had to reduce its staff due to a lack of demand for its product.
example.egtrans: 因为产品的需求不足，工厂只能裁减员工。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 减少, 消减, 裁减

example.eg: Ian is giving up smoking and has reduced the number of cigarettes he smokes each day to three.
example.egtrans: 伊安正在戒烟，将每天抽的烟削减到三根。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 将…削减到, 将…缩减至

example.eg: I need to reduce this A3 poster so that it will fit onto a sheet of A4.
example.egtrans: 我需要将这张A3的海报缩小一些，以便将其放进A4纸上。

example.eg: The number of visitors to this town has reduced in recent years.
example.egtrans: 近年来，到镇上旅游的访客减少了。

example.eg: A once-wealthy woman, she has been reduced to begging in the street.
We were so poor back then that we were reduced to living on peanut butter and crackers.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 使…不得不, 使…被迫做

example.eg: Reduce the wine by boiling it in a saucepan.
The fraction 5/10 can be reduced to 1/2.
Surgery was needed to reduce the fractured bone.
The conflict cannot be reduced to a simple view of good versus evil.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 将…概括成, 将…简化为

example.eg: The building was reduced to pieces by the force of the explosion.
That whole speech could be reduced to "Be nice."
They have reduced education to rote learning and memorization.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 使…沦落到, 让…沦落为

example.eg: Doctors will always try to reduce the temperature of patients with fever.
